description.zh: Wizarr 是一个专为 Plex、Jellyfin 和 Emby 等媒体服务器设计的自动用户邀请系统。它通过生成一个唯一的邀请链接，简化了邀请朋友和家人加入服务器的过程。平台还引导用户完成设置，包括应用程序下载和请求系统访问。
description.en: Wizarr is an automatic user invitation system designed for media servers like Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby. It simplifies the process of inviting friends and family by generating a unique link that automatically adds users to your server. The platform also guides them through setup, including app downloads and request system access.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 通过单个邀请链接简化用户注册流程
- 提供引导式设置提升用户体验
- 支持多种媒体平台和请求系统

## 功能列表:

- 支持 Plex、Jellyfin、Emby、AudiobookShelf、Komga、Kavita 和 Romm 的自动邀请
- 安全且用户友好的邀请流程
- 即插即用的 SSO 支持
- 多层级邀请权限
- 限时会员选项
- 媒体应用设置引导（如 Plex）
- 请求系统集成（如 Overseerr、Ombi）
- Discord 邀请支持
- 可通过自定义 HTML 片段进行完全自定义
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Simplifies user onboarding with a single invite link
- Enhances user experience with guided setup process
- Supports a wide range of media and request systems

## Features:

- Automatic invitations for Plex, Jellyfin, Emby, AudiobookShelf, Komga, Kavita and Romm
- Secure, user-friendly invitation process
- Plug-and-play SSO support
- Multi-tiered invitation access
- Time-limited membership options
- Setup guide for media apps (like Plex)
- Request system integration (Overseerr, Ombi, etc.)
- Discord invite support
- Fully customisable with your own HTML snippets
